item.title: Farvel til alt det
item.description: September update: After a short but intense job hunt, I’m happy to say I’ll be working with Peakon at their beautiful office in Copenhagen in a few weeks! Thanks to all who shared and read this post, it was a vast help to me. After 9 years in New York, I am leaving for good on August 1st, when I’ll be moving to Copenhagen with my wife and cat.

item.title: Fizzbuzz is a Jazz Standard
Calling a C function from Rust
item.description: Today I went to a Rust meetup. I had some ideas of what I might work on, but I’ve started to try and be more open to random nerdsnipes and discussions at these things. Here’s something I was thinking about and a little experiment that was an equally little success, that is to say, a success that was :+1: but isn’t that big of a thing. I’m happy about it though.
